definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: trip, take quick little steps (cf. Ar. t.af=a pass by quickly, t.af=a0fun light, brisk, quick, of horse; poss. cf. Syr. t.apt.ep flicker)—

definitions.title: Qal
definitions.body: Inf. abs. [[טָפׂף]] Is 3:16 [[הָלוֹךְ וְטָפׂף תֵּלַכְנׇה]], of women of Jerusalem.
